Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes studying your surroundings in search of omens related to a particular course of action to cast [_augury_](/Spells.aspx?ID=15) as an innate divine spell. Unless the result of the _augury_ was “nothing,” you gain the following reaction for the next 30 minutes:
